newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Theodoor Gilissen ups Cap Gemini to hold.
newsitem.headline: Theodoor Gilissen ups Cap Gemini to hold.

text.p: COMMENT: (HOLD from sell) Provisional half-year results signal company is able to recruit people and therefore increase turnover. But caution is necessary as turnover per employee was almost unchanged (+0.6 pct), probably due to more younger staff. Consequently, lower labour costs positively impact gross margin, but increased need for training and less experience has negative effect on productivity growth.

But first half results were better than anticipated and stock underperformed market by some 15 percent since October 1996. Due to better earnings expectations, we believe Cap Gemini will perform in line with the market, and upgrade recommandation from sell to hold.
